text: Eta gayebera sambadera antarbhukta, ya amara apanake ohi dbara abahita karachi. Ara marâ€Œimera tattbabadhanera dayitba tadera madhye ke grahana karabe era jan'ya yakhana tara tadera kalama niksepa karachila [1] apani takhana tadera nikata chilena na ebam tara yakhana badanubada karachila takhano apani tadera nikata chilena na
